TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed BoundsSpecified extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the bounds of the control to use when defining a control's size and position.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the members of this enumeration when calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBounds%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class.
## Examples [!code-cs[Control.Layout#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.windows.forms.b_8_1.cs)] [!code-vb[Control.Layout#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.windows.forms.b_8_1.vb)] [!code-cpp[Control.Layout#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.windows.forms.b_8_1.cpp)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified All = int32(15)

Docs.summary: Both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> property values are defined.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified Height = int32(8)

Docs.summary: The height of the control is defined.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified Location = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Both and coordinates of the control are defined.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified None = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified Size = int32(12)

Docs.summary: Both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> property values of the control are defined.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified Width = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The width of the control is defined.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified X = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The left edge of the control is defined.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified Y = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The top edge of the control is defined.
